lexUnit.name: cuff.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a.the end part of a sleeve, where the material of the sleeve is turned back or a separate band is sewn on

sentence.text: Dot clutched at the cuffs of her coat but even the familiar softness of worn velvet was not reassuring .
He flicked back the cuff of his jacket to glance at his watch and as he did so he saw that he was still carrying Maidstone 's hat .
The smell was unpleasant too but she resisted the temptation to remove her scented handkerchief from the cuff of her blouse .
He touched the right cuff of his pullover .
She shot her cuff and checked her wrist monitor .
As we were turning to follow his directions , he drew up his cuff and showed us the blue tattooed cross that all Copts have on the inside of their wrists .
His eccentricities were revealed in his habits of unbuttoning his suit cuffs and turning them back , or wearing one v-neck jumper on top of another .
The long sleeves ended in generous lace cuffs at the wrists .
Hamilton came back into the shop , rolling his shirtsleeves down and buttoning the cuffs .
His eccentricities were revealed in his habits of unbuttoning his suit cuffs and turning them back , or wearing one v-neck jumper on top of another .
Awkward in the company of Hudson and Penny , he simply sniffed and polished the cuff of his leather jacket on his neat , mod , herringbone trousers .
Patrick nodded dumbly as she walked away , working on the buttons on her cuffs .
Harry dipped the blade into the sea to wash it , and dried it on the cuff of his shirt before replacing it in its sheath .
While I ca n't condone this sort of cheating Mr Unce , I have found two very good methods are tucking them down your sock or writing them on your shirt cuff .
He slipped into his coat and shook his arms to make his shirt cuffs appear .
` What 's amiss ? " this man now cried , rubbing his forehead with his cuffs .
Millet played with a lace cuff .
He even pulled back his cuff to look at his watch .
Her cuff was still undone , and the tourniquet had made her hand and lower arm into white marble , but Anne could see no new puncture .
Make sure that the ankle cuff is comfortable and does not catch your ankle bone in the wrong place .
Sew a little loop of elastic inside the cuff of her sweater , which can be looped over a thumb to stop the sleeves bunching up uncomfortably when she puts her coat on .
The cuffs of his raincoat had been neatly turned .
